Products.Name: India After Gandhi
Products.Preview: Ramachandra Guha’s hugely acclaimed book tells the full story - the pain and the struggle, the humiliations and the glories - of the world’s largest and least likely democracy.

Products.Name: An Era of Darkness
Products.Preview: In 1930, the American historian and philosopher Will Durant wrote that Britain’s ‘conscious and deliberate bleeding of India… [was the] greatest crime in all history’. He was not the only one to denounce the rapacity and cruelty of British rule, and his assessment was not exaggerated.

Products.Name: Into Thin Air
Products.Preview: A bank of clouds was assembling on the not-so-distant horizon, but journalist-mountaineer Jon Krakauer, standing on the summit of Mt. Everest, saw nothing that suggested that a murderous storm was bearing down. He was wrong.

Products.Name: Treasure Island
Products.Preview: Think of the high seas and of a buccaneer ship; of a wild seaman with a sea chest full of gold; of Long John Silver; of a buried treasure and of young Jim Hawkins, the boy with the treasure map the key to it all.

Products.Name: House of Leaves
Products.Preview: House of Leaves is the debut novel by American author Mark Z. Danielewski, published in March 2000 by Pantheon Books. A bestseller, it has been translated into a number of languages, and is followed by a companion piece, The Whalestoe Letters.

Products.Name: Bad Boys for Life
Products.Cast: Will Smith, Nicky jam, Jacob Scipio, DJ khaled

Products.Name: The Martian
Products.Cast: Matt Damon, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels

Products.Cast: Abhimanyu Dasani, Radhika Madan, Sweta Basu, Jimit Trivedi
